name: zefiel
text: You may be on to something. Beef's way of talking didn't change when he died. Then again, he never came back to earth as a Ghost. Oh, but Téodor never got to heaven in the first place, and he talked the same.

text: In Heaven the cell phone provider isn't ATT, Verizon, Alltel or any of the other @#$%#% "providers." THAT'S WHAT MAKES IT HEAVEN!
